remark.ch: 建議先修材料科學、精密機械製造

goal.ch:
課程教學目標：
本課程旨在介紹先進銲接、表面處理及先進電腦輔助製造及3D積層製造等，使學生進一步深入了解精密機械製造技術與知識。課程將著重於現代常見的焊接原理、材料表面處理與硬化方法、電腦整合製造技術及3D積層製造未來趨勢發展，深入解析其背後的基本原理、運作方式及應用特徵。透過這些內容，學生將能夠掌握相關精密製造技術，並培養具備工程分析與問題解決能力，作為未來從事機械與機電相關的人才。
預期成效：
透過本課程，學生不僅能夠理解並應用先進機械製造過程中的重要焊接、表面處理、電腦輔助方法與3D積層製造技術，促使學生了解現行先進機械製造產業人才需求重點，為未來的職涯打下堅實基礎。
goal.en:
Course teaching objectives:
This course aims to introduce advanced welding, surface treatment, advanced computer-aided manufacturing and 3D additive manufacturing, etc., so that students can further understand precision machinery manufacturing technology and knowledge. The course will focus on modern common welding principles, material surface treatment and hardening methods, computer integrated manufacturing technology and the future development trend of 3D additive manufacturing, and provide an in-depth analysis of the basic principles, operation methods and application characteristics behind them. Through these contents, students will be able to master relevant precision manufacturing technologies and develop engineering analysis and problem-solving skills as talents engaged in machinery and electromechanical related fields in the future.
Expected results:
Through this course, students can not only understand and apply the important welding, surface treatment, computer-aided methods and 3D additive manufacturing technology in the advanced machinery manufacturing process, but also enable students to understand the current key needs of talents in the advanced machinery manufacturing industry and prepare for their future careers. Lay a solid foundation.

outline.ch:
1.課程介紹與上課規範：教本、課程、評分及上課規範介紹
2.機械材料：材料性質、顯微結構與特性介紹
3.先進焊接加工技術：熔合熔接及固態熔接的製程、硬焊、軟焊、黏接與非破壞檢測及分析
4.先進表面處理技術：表面硬化、PVD、CVD、滲氮與滲碳法、其他表面處理製程
5.電腦輔助製造與系統：製造流程和操作的自動化、電腦輔助製造、電腦整合製造系統
6.先進3D積層製造技術：積層製造原理、積層製造技術說明、技術比較與發展趨勢
7.複習與測驗：期中複習與考試；期末複習與考試
outline.en:
1. Course introduction and class specifications: Introduction to textbooks, courses, grading and class specifications
2. Mechanical materials: introduction to material properties, microstructure and characteristics
3. Advanced welding processing technology: fusion welding and solid state welding processes, brazing, soldering, bonding and non-destructive testing and analysis
4. Advanced surface treatment technology: surface hardening, PVD, CVD, nitriding and carburizing methods, and other surface treatment processes
5. Computer-aided manufacturing and systems: automation of manufacturing processes and operations, computer-aided manufacturing, and computer-integrated manufacturing systems
6. Advanced 3D additive manufacturing technology: additive manufacturing principles, additive manufacturing technology description, technology comparison and development trends
7. Review and test: mid-term review and exam; final review and exam
